ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: I would definitely /bug it.  It sounds like the language bug (Improvements invisible until you zone). By the way, did you try zoning instead of logging out?
ygData.messageBody:
I would definitely /bug it. It sounds like the language bug (Improvements invisible until you zone). By the way, did you try zoning instead of logging out? It might work.


>
>
> In case you're wondering... It DID happen. Logging back in seemed to affect the skill. I have also heard that putting one skill point into it would knock it out of its stasis and allow it to continuously improve again. I know that its not supposed to work that way... but thats how it is.
>
>
